Congratulations on protecting your loved ones.


Next steps.

Determine Insurance Purpose

Discuss the reason consumer is interested in insurance and determine additional needs


Uncover Underwriting Considerations

Review any health concerns that may impact consumer qualification


Consider Desired Coverage Amount/Budget

Discuss consumer's desired coverage amount based on insurance purpose and budget considerations


Make Recommendation

  • Make initial recommendation based upon Needs Assessment
  • Explain product and its benefits

Authenticate Consumer

Consumer must verify their full name and provide 2 additional pieces of information:

  • Address
  • Date of Birth
  • Phone Number
  • Last 4 of SSN


Anchoring Opportunities

  • Anchor on Credit Union (or TruStage, if appropriate) and thank them for being a member
  • Anchor on what initiated the call (primary campaign source)
